DialogueNode.npc_text: ”This device fires capsules of special glue, also my invention, that hardens very rapidly upon exposure to air. A hit should immobilize a human target for long enough so as to be disarmed and neutralized. I have here some anesthetic medicine that can be used to take them out of commission for quite some time after you have first made them non-resistant to being injected.”
DialogueNode.speaker: Sebastian
